messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Fl homeschool options
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/19/05 7:42:44 A.M. Eastern Standard Time, ... Is  there a Florida list this discussion can move to?   This isn t the  list to discuss
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/19/05 7:42:44 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

> But FL also has the umbrella option which keeps you from dealing with
> the school district and there are umbrellas out there that don't
> require anything but attendance (that is, email them a list of 'school
> days' and you're done, just so they can say Yes you 'attended').
>

Is there a Florida list this discussion can move to? This isn't the list
to
discuss this.


Try _www.alternativeeducationinstitute.org_
(http://www.alternativeeducationinstitute.org) . My kids are registered here and we do what we want, just
count days and don't even keep a portfolio. It's in Davie, Florida, and listed
as a private school, which means you can homeschool any way you want under it.

Hope this helps,
Victoria


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
